name: A bit about our project.
text:
We realise that we could've just ripped some random website off, but this actually seems fun! Also, Yaakov Chaikin inspired us. <3
As for the theme, we decided to do something actually enjoyable for us, instead of just recreating some online shop or whatever.

name: ICPC merch.
text:
I returned from ICPC a while back. Finally remembered to add a picture! Look at all this stuff!
P.s.: They also gave us T-shirts, but I was wearing it while taking the picture. :)

name: ICPC merch (Pt. 2).
text: Totally forgot to show off my badge!

name: The International Festival of Turkic-speaking Youth
text: I was at the festival in July 11th-15th, 2023. Where Turkic youth from various countries met with support from the Turksoy organization and the Ministry of Culture and Tourism of Uzbekistan.Vestifal was very interesting and also brought an interesting experience in communicating with peoples with similar languages.

name: Happy New Year
text: The new year will be coming soon, I hope this year has been interesting and great. We wish you all the best for 2025.
